key_risks: Regulatory and legal scrutiny from multiple investigations
Economic sensitivity due to exposure to real estate, agriculture, and small-to-medium-sized businesses
Cybersecurity risks from potential threats and reliance on third-party vendors
Competitive pressures from traditional banks and fintech companies
Consumer complaints indicating operational inefficiencies or customer service challenges
controversies: Investigations by law firms regarding potential breaches of fiduciary duty and violations of federal securities laws
Decline in share price raising concerns about market confidence
social_issues: Consumer complaints related to checking or savings accounts and credit reporting issues
governance_issues: Potential breaches of fiduciary duty and violations of federal securities laws
